Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations

Class GameMarker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.GameMarker
public class GameMarker
extends java.lang.Object
Brief The game expansions marker used for all expansions in the game. It is useful as specifies the owner and the target Player of the expansion
See Also:
Expansion, Expandable

      public static java.util.List<GameMarker> enemiesAsTarget​(Player current, java.util.List<Player> enemies)
      Brief Provides a list of markers that has in common a current Player as owner. One marker is provided per enemy Player (set as target)
      Parameters:
      current - current Player
      enemies - list of enemies Players

      The list of produced markers
